title: Think It Over
lyrics:
Ohh ohh ohh, ohh ohh ohh
Ohh ohh ohh
Well, damn
I think it's done
Take it back

Turn around

I start all over again



He'll start to pack up

And she'll pretend she's sorry

"wait babe, can't we be friends?"





She thinks that if she calls

She can always have him

Call, and back again



But darling, this time

We're not picking up the pieces

That will be the end





I've been waiting for you

You say, "please come over"

I know I shouldn't so

I'll wait, wait, think it over



He swears, "darling, it's through"

But looks over his shoulder

Maybe she loves him

So we'll wait, wait, think it over





Think it over





Well, damn

I better run

Take it back

Turn around

I start all over again





I'll make a clean break

And when he starts to miss me

[?] call, "where have you been?"





I know that if I fall

I can always have them crawling back again

But darling, this time

When she picks up the pieces

That will be the end





I've been waiting for you

You say, "please come over"

I know I shouldn't so

I'll wait, wait, think it over



He swears, "darling, it's through"

But looks over his shoulder

Maybe she loves him

So we'll wait, wait, think it over





So the story ends, my dear

Exactly as it starts

You think we can still be friends

After you break my heart





Ohh ohh ohh, ohh ohh ohh

Ohh ohh ohh, ohh ohh ohh

Ohh ohh ohh





I've been waiting for you

You say, "please come over"

I know I shouldn't so

I'll wait, wait, think it over



He swears, "darling, it's through"

But looks over his shoulder

Maybe she loves him

So we'll wait, wait, think it over





I've been waiting for you

You say, "please come over"

I know I shouldn't so

I'll wait, wait, think it over



He swears, "darling, it's through"

But looks over his shoulder

Maybe she loves him

So we wait, wait, think it over



I've been waiting for you

(I've been waiting for you)

I've been waiting for you

(I've been waiting for you)

I've been waiting for you

(I've been waiting for you)



Maybe she loves him

So we wait, wait, think it over



(nailed it!)
